title: Blended Massive Online Course-Based Workplace English Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Vocabulary Proficiency, Familiarity with Fundamental Workplace Terminology
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate business English communication skills required in the math domain. Strengthening practical English application competencies tailored to learner roles (leader/manager)

learning_goals: They can utilize core English expressions with a frequency of 80% or higher in business meetings and presentations.
They can read English technical documents (reports, emails) related to mathematics and accurately summarize key content at 70% or higher.
Based on a mobile environment, they can complete 90% or more of weekly project assignments and perform peer and self-evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
